name: Walkers Amino for The Walking Dead Fan Community
description: Walkers Amino is the largest mobile social network for Walking Dead fans!  - Build a profile showing your passion for the Walking Dead - Chat with other Walking Dead superfans around the world - Discuss your favorite episodes, seasons, games, etc. - Gain a massive following by sharing your thoughts, finds, and creations - Discover Walking Dead fan art, photos, writing, and cosplay.  In Walkers Amino, you can:  - Create polls and discussions to share with other superfans - Show off your fan creations - Share your thoughts on the latest AMC season - Connect with local Walking Dead fans  Discover other Walking Dead fans nearby and around the world who share your passion for Rick Grimes, zombies, the undead, walkers, the zombie apocalypse, horror, and Robert Kirkman. Post and read episode reviews, recaps, fan theories, and join discussions on your favorite Walking Dead series. Ask and answer questions on the fly and search for expert answers on everything about Walking Dead. Join us and experience your passion like never before!   Come find us on the web: http://www.aminoapps.com/
